devture_translation.error_while_saving_please_reload: Error while saving. Reload the page and try again.
devture_translation.error_while_writing: Could not save the translation data for: %resource%/%locale%. Ensure the files are writable by the web server user.
devture_translation.minor_source_fix: Minor correction. Keep existing translations for other languages.

warning.editing_source_translations_invalidates: Changing %language_name% translations normally invalidates the same translations for all other languages.
warning.editing_source_translations_invalidates2: Whatever you change here, would then have to be translated again to each language other than %language_name% (unless you mark it as a Minor Correction).
